text:
IBM Managed Security Services Strategy DirectorJob ID SEC-0794705 Job type Full-time RegularWork country USA Position type ProfessionalWork city - Any Posted 18-Sep-2015Travel 25% travel annually Job area Consulting & ServicesBusiness group IBM Security Job category ConsultantBusiness unit SecuritySvcs Job role Security Consultant Job role skillset Security Strategy, Risk & Compliance ServicesCommissionable/Sales-Incentive jobs only NoJob descriptionThis role helps clients understand key security and privacy issues, risks, exposures and vulnerabilities using workshops and assessments and develop security and privacy programs to meet client's business needs. They also architect secure solutions to address specific security and privacy requirements.IBM is seeking a Strategy Director for its rapidly growing Managed Security Services (MSS) business. Reporting into the Director of Managed Security Services, this senior leadership position will develop and execute key components of the MSS business strategy. The ideal candidate will apply extensive knowledge of the information security industry and strategic leadership and leverage prior experience in managed services to drive transformation of MSS to achieve higher, more repeatable service quality, unparalleled security protection, and a signature client experience while also ensuring key business goals are met. The Strategy Director must be able to demonstrate a firm understanding of industry leading security standards, tools and technology, build and develop a strong team to facilitate execution of the strategy, and gain the support of other key security leaders.More specifically, the position will be responsible for:Developing robust business architecture to build and connect MSS operational and business systems to increase visibility for MSS leaders and allow them to make better data driven decisions for the business to reach its key revenue and profit goals.Overseeing the tactical implementation of increased automation across MSS service delivery to reduce costs and increase quality on repeated processes.Increasing the quantity and quality of operational and business reporting available to MSS leaders and practitioners.Designing flexible growth strategy that will enable the business to adapt to geographic market demands while preserving operational leverage and scalability.Creating and maintaining relationships with services and technology partners in order to find key technologies or processes that will enhance MSSâ€™s strategy.Serving as a senior MSS business sponsor and strategic advisor to high valued clients.Providing security industry thought leadership and IP development that promotes and extends the IBM Security brand.Working effectively in a matrix-based environment to drive results, while building strong internal relationships and learning how to leverage the full potential of IBM.Evaluating investment opportunities such as partnerships, new offerings and acquisitions against business strategy, delivery strategy and financial objectives.The ideal candidate will have several years of experience in managing a global services business, understand the details of an MSS subscription business model, and demonstrate proven acumen in strategic planning and management. This role will require highly effective oral and written communications skills, the ability to continuously adapt in dynamic and complex global business organization, and well tuned organization skills to maintain focus on the most critical priorities.Required * At least 8 years experience in Information Security industry * At least 5 years experience in a senior management or executive role running security operations * At least 5 years experience in process development and implementation * At least 5 years experience in P&L development * At least 5 years experience in Project Management, teamwork, and collaboration * At least 5 years experience in analyzing business processes * At least 5 years experience in data collection, analysis, and consulting * At least 5 years experience in risk analysis and management * At least 5 years experience in demonstrating communication and facilitation skills * At least 5 years experience in demonstrating ability to identify and assess risk exposures * Readiness to travel 25% travel annually * English: Fluent* Master's Degree IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, age, or veteran status. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status. Company info International Business Machines Corp. ( IBM Corporation ) Website : http://www.ibm.com/

We empower our employees and others to serve their communities. We integrate corporate citizenship and social responsibility into every aspect of our company. Employer job
